creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip

medium: Pen, brush, india ink, and white heightening on tan light card
object_name: Bookplate design for John R. and Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
signed: [M.P.] in center, on lower ledge in the body of the drawing
title: Bookplate design for John R. and Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
